item.title: My command Compiles properly, but it doesn't work?
item.dc:creator: @davedave davedave
item.description:
@davedave wrote:

Take a look for yourself.
Btw this is Delta…

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“b33nuser”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(9);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

  if(otherPIndex != -1) {
  client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
  p.yell("["+playerName+"]: I'm gaiii and happy!!!");
  p.plrText = "I'm gay everyone...";
  yell("["+playerName+"]: Wtf?! Get away from me!");
} else {
	sM("The b33n doesn't exist.");
}
} catch (Exception e) {
	sM("Try entering a name you wish to b33n..");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
